auth.error: Sorry, we got an error when trying verifying user.

dnsConfiguration.title: DNS Configuration
dnsConfiguration.description: Log in to the account you have with your DNS provider, and add a CNAME record for app pointing to {{domain}}
dnsConfiguration.footerText: If you’ve already done this, allow up to 24 hours for the changes to propgate.
dnsConfiguration.error: Sorry we were unable to verify your DNS settings. Please make sure your DNS records as indicated below are correctly applied with your DNS provider. If you’ve already done so, please wait a few minutes and click Verify again.

nameServer.title: DNS Configuration

step1.title: Step 1: Point A record to {{ip}}
step1.description: Create an A record for {{domain}} pointing to our load balancer’s IP address {{ip}}.

step2.title: Step 2: Create an NS record for _dnslink
step2.description: Create a NS record for _dnslink pointing to our name server.
step2.footer: Please make sure DNS records as indicated above are correctly applied with your DNS provider. It can take up to a few minutes to apply; click “Verify DNS Configuration” below to check if the changes have propagated.

nameServer.footer: An SSL certificate will automatically be applied to the domain and an additional www.subdomain, that will be created to redirect to the root domain.

paymentMethod.title: Add Payment Method
paymentMethod.success: Your payment info has been saved successfully
paymentMethod.error: An error has occurred while adding your payment information

deleteSite.title: Delete Site
deleteSite.siteNameInput: Type in name of site to confirm
deleteSite.error: Error when trying to delete the site, please try again later.

message.part1: Are you sure you want to delete
message.part2: If so, please type the name of the site to confirm.

uploadFiles.title: Upload
uploadFiles.uploadingError: Error when trying to upload the files, please try again later.

changeSiteName.title: Change site name
changeSiteName.error: Error when trying to change the site name, please try again later.
changeSiteName.message: The site name determines the default URL for your site. Only alphanumeric characters and hyphens are allowed.

dnsLink.title: Optional: Set up DNS link for your domain
dnsLink.subTitle: Step 1: Add CNAME record to set up DNS link
dnsLink.subtitle2: Add this CNAME record to your DNS provider to set up DNS link

createFolder.title: Create Folder
createFolder.error: Error when trying to create a new folder, please try again later.
createFolder.invalidName: Folder name cannot contain any of the following characters: ?%*:|"<>

deleteStoredItems.title: Delete File
deleteStoredItems.messageOneFile: Are you sure you want to delete {{fileName}} file?
deleteStoredItems.messageManyFiles: Are you sure you want to delete {{filesNumber}} files?
deleteStoredItems.error: Error when trying to remove the files, please try again later.

apiDetails.title: API Details
apiDetails.copy: Your api {{type}} was successfully copied to your clipboard.
apiDetails.warning: API Secret is only visible upon generation
apiDetails.error: We're sorry, there was an error when trying to generate a new api key.

deployInfo.title: Deploy Info
deployInfo.subtitle: Auto publishing is {{isAuto}}.
deployInfo.descriptionNotAuto: Deploys from {{branch}} are not published automatically.

deployStatus.title: Deploy Status
deployStatus.description: Fleek's robots are busy building and deploying your site to IPFS and our CDN

http.title: HTTPS
http.paragraph: Enable automatic TLS certificates with Cloudflare, or use your own certificate

ssl.title: SSL/TLS certificate
ssl.errorParagraph: To provision a certificate automatically, Fleek needs to go through a domain validation process on your behalf. This step cannot be completed unless the DNS records for your custom domain are already pointing at our servers.
ssl.errorLink: Learn more about HTTPS on custom domains
ssl.error: We could not provision a Cloudflare certificate for your custom domain.
ssl.waitingParagraph: We’ll provision your Let’s Encrypt certificate automatically once the DNS configuration for your custom domain is pointing to our servers and the changes have propagated.
ssl.notDeployedParagraph: We’ll provision your SSL certificate automatically once you successfully deploy a site or add a custom domain to your site pointing to our servers.

ens.title: ENS
ens.paragraph: Add your ENS to your Fleek site

setControllerModal.title: Set up Fleek ENS controller
setControllerModal.setControllerStep: Step {{stepNumber}}: Set Fleek as ENS controller
setControllerModal.verifyOwnershipParagraph: Verify that you are the owner of this domain by signing a message. This step does not create a transaction or cost gas.
setControllerModal.migrateEnsParagraph: Click Migrate below to go to app.ens.domains to update your ENS domain to the most recent resolver.
setControllerModal.setControllerParagraph: Set Fleek as a controller to your ENS domain to set your site to point to your ENS domain and automatically update for all future site deployments.

errors.failedToConnect: Failed to connect, please try again
errors.notOwnerOfDomain: Connected account is not the owner of the domain
errors.failedTransaction: The Ethereum transaction did not go through

ensBox.title: ENS Info
ensBox.description: Add an ENS domain to point to your deployed site. Fleek will automatically update future deployments to point to your ENS domain.

noDomain.learnMore: Learn more about ENS in our docs

addEns.title: Add a ENS domain to your site
addEns.description: Use an existing ENS domain to deploy your site on. Fleek will update the IPFS hash the ENS name is pointing to for auto deploys.
addEns.learnMore: Learn more about ENS in our docs
addEns.alreadyOwner: <0>{{owner}}</0> is the owner of {{domain}}. Is that you?
addEns.wouldYouLike: Would you like to make this purchase?
addEns.byClicking: By clicking buy, we will redirect you to purchase your ENS domain
addEns.weRecommend: We recommend you set Fleek as a controller on your ENS domain to automate updating the content of your site for future deployments.
addEns.domainRegistered: This ENS domain is already associated with another Fleek site which could cause conflicts upon site updates.
addEns.notRegistrant: You are not the registrant of this domain

domains.title: Domains
domains.paragraph: Add your own custom domain to your Fleek site for free

customDomains.title: Custom Domains
customDomains.error: Error when trying to delete the domain, please try again.
customDomains.paragraph: By default, your site is always accessible via a Fleek subdomain based on the site name. Custom domains allow you to access your site via one or more non-Fleek domain names.
customDomains.learnAboutCustomDomains: Learn more about custom domains in our docs
customDomains.learnAboutRedirect: Learn more about redirect rules in our docs
customDomains.pollingMessage: You’ve successfully purchased a domain, please wait a couple of minutes for it to propagate.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: Sorry, we couldnt find the page you are looking for

connectWithGithub.title: Continuous Deployment
connectWithGithub.subtitle: When you push to Git we run your build tool on our services and deploy the result.

buildOptions.cardSubtitle: Get more control over how Fleek builds and deploys your site with these settings.
buildOptions.title: Basic build settings
buildOptions.subtitle: If you're using a static site generator or build tool, we'll need these settings to build your site.
buildOptions.pickPlanInfo: The {{planName}} team plan includes up to {{sitesLimit}} sites, please upgrade your plan to deploy.
buildOptions.buildCommandTooltip: The build command to run before deploying. Examples: build, gulp build, make all.
buildOptions.publishDirectoryTooltip: The directory to deploy after running the build command. Examples: _site, dist, public.
buildOptions.dockerImageTooltip: The docker image and tag from the Docker Hub to use as a base when building your site.
buildOptions.frameworkToolip: The framework used by the site
buildOptions.gatsbyPlugin: Make sure you have the Gatsby IPFS plugin installed in your app.

envVars.title: Environment Variables
envVars.subtitle: Define environment variables for more control and flexibility over your build.

errors.onlyAlphaNumericAndUnderscore: Variable names can only consist of alphanumeric characters and underscores.
errors.startWithLetter: Variable names must start with a letter.

stepper.title: Create a new site
stepper.description: From zero to hero, three easy steps to get your site live.

pickRepository.title: Continuous Deployment: GitHub App
pickRepository.subtitle: Choose the repository you want to link to your site on Fleek. When you push to Git we run your build tool on our services and deploy the result.

editPermissionsLink.question: Can’t see your repo here?
editPermissionsLink.link: Configure the Fleek app on GitHub.

deploy.FAILED: Site has not yet been deployed
deploy.CANCELLED: Site has not yet been deployed

filesUploaded.title: All files already uploaded

redirectRulesProcessed.title: No redirect rules processed
redirectRulesProcessed.subtitle: This deploy did not include any redirect rules.

headerRulesProcessed.title: No header rules processed
headerRulesProcessed.subtitle: This deploy did not include any header rules.

linkedResources.title: All linked resources are secure
linkedResources.subtitle: Congratulations! No insecure mixed content found in your files.

buildTime.title: Build time: {{buildTime}}. Total deploy time: {{totalDeployTime}}

deployment.subtitle: Settings for Continuous Deployment from a Git repository

buildSettings.title: Build Settings
buildSettings.learnMore: Learn more about common configuration directives in the docs
buildSettings.baseDirectoryTip: Directory to change to before starting a build. Where we will look for package.json/.nvmrc/etc.

deployContexts.title: Deploy Contexts
deployContexts.subtitle: Deploy contexts are a way to tell Fleek how to build your site. They give you the flexibility to configure your site’s builds depending on the context they are going to be deployed to.
deployContexts.learnMore: Learn more about deploy contexts in the docs
deployContexts.error: Sorry, we got an error when editing deploy settings.

previewPRs.label: Deploy previews
previewPRs.onTitle: Automatically build deploy previews for all pull requests
previewPRs.onDescription: Every pull request gets deployed in its own context with a unique URL.
previewPRs.offTitle: Don’t build deploy previews for pull requests
previewPRs.offDescription: Fleek won’t deploy any pull requests.

addCustomDomain.title: Add a custom domain to your site
addCustomDomain.description: You can bring a domain name that you already own, or buy a new one. When you buy the domain with us, we automatically configure your DNS settings and provision a wildcard certificate for your domain.

ownerPart.question: already has an owner. Is it you?

purchasing.description: Purchasing domains within Fleek will be available soon. In the meantime purchase your domain elsewhere and add it as an external domain.
